title: Feature Request: Reconnect on first connection
author: ahake
body_snippet:
This is not a high priority, just a nice-to-have. When a connection drops, mRemoteNG tries to reconnect. It would be nice if it would try to reconnect when you first connect. 

## Expected Behavior
When you first connect to a server, if that connection cannot be made, mRemoteNG should retry to connect for as many times as it would do for a dropped connection (default: 20)
This should be optional, perhaps settable via a checkbox in the properties

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to retry initial connection failures using existing reconnect logic, useful for connecting to servers still booting up
Approach: Add a RetryOnFirstConnect option (checkbox in Connection settings) that reuses the existing ReconnectOnDisconnect/ReconnectGroup mechanism when initial connection fails, applying the same retry count and delay as dropped-connection reconnects
